body:
Select  ISQBW.WarehouseName, * From dbo.Pv_Rn_Inventory_SeriesQuantityByWarehouse ISQBW Where   ISQBW.SerieId = 82409

Select  ISQBW.WarehouseName, ISQBW.SerieId, ISQBW.LotId, *
From    dbo.Pv_Rn_Inventory_SeriesQuantityByWarehouse ISQBW
Where   ISQBW.LotId = 5560 And  ISQBW.WarehouseId = 160

Select  ISQBW.[Depo Adı], ISQBW.TransactionDate, *
From    dbo.Pv_Rn_Inventory_BillItemSeries ISQBW
Where   ISQBW.SerieId = 82409

Select  ISQBW.TotalQuantity, *
From    dbo.TvFn_Rn_Inventory_SeriesQuantityByWarehouse_AsOf('2025-09-01 08:00:00.000') ISQBW
Where   ISQBW.SerieId = 82409

Select  ICILS.SeriesId, ICILS.LotId, ICILS.Quantity, ISQBW.TotalQuantity, *
From    dbo.TvFn_Rn_Inventory_SeriesQuantityByWarehouse_AsOf('2025-09-01 08:00:00.000') ISQBW
        Left Outer Join dbo.Tb_Rn_Inventory_CountItemLotSeries ICILS On
                        ICILS.WarehouseId = ISQBW.WarehouseId
                        And  (ICILS.SeriesId = ISQBW.SerieId Or  ICILS.SeriesId Is Null)
                        And (ICILS.LotId = ISQBW.LotId Or   ICILS.LotId Is Null)
Where   ISQBW.SerieId = 82409
        And   ICILS.CountId = 6
        And   Exists (Select    1 From  dbo.Tb_Rn_Inventory_CountWarehouses ICW2 Where  ICW2.CountId = 6
                                                                                      And ICW2.WarehouseId = ISQBW.WarehouseId)

Select  *
From    dbo.Tb_Rn_Inventory_CountItemLotSeries ICILS
        Left Join dbo.Tb_Rn_Inventory_CountWarehouses ICW On
                  ICW.CountId = ICILS.CountId
        Left Join dbo.TvFn_Rn_Inventory_SeriesQuantityByWarehouse_AsOf('2025-09-01 08:00:00.000') ISQBW On
                  ICILS.WarehouseId = ISQBW.WarehouseId
                  And (ICILS.SeriesId = ISQBW.SerieId Or ICILS.SeriesId Is Null)
                  And (ICILS.LotId = ISQBW.LotId Or   ICILS.LotId Is Null)
Where   ICILS.CountId = 6
        And   Exists (Select    1 From  dbo.Tb_Rn_Inventory_CountWarehouses ICW2 Where  ICW2.CountId = 6
                                                                                      And ICW2.WarehouseId = ISQBW.WarehouseId)
        And  ICILS.SeriesId = 82409
